message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_MUST_BE_RESERVED_ASSIGNED
message.locale: One of either Add To My Tasks or Assign To must be entered but not both.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_DEADLINE_NOT_FUTURE_DATE
message.locale: The deadline date and time must be in the future.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_SUBJECT_EMPTY
message.locale: The subject must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_PRIORITY_EMPTY
message.locale: The priority must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_DEADLINE_EMPTY
message.locale: The deadline must be entered.

message.name: INF_TASK_COMMENT_ADDED
message.locale: Comment added to %1s:

message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_CLOSED
message.locale: This task is closed, therefore a comment may not be added.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ALREADY_DEFERRED
message.locale: This task has already been deferred.

message.name: ERR_TASK_MUST_BE_RESERVED_TO_YOU
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore cannot be deferred by you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NOT_RESERVED_CANNOT_BE_DEFERRED
message.locale: This task is not in a My Tasks list and therefore cannot be deferred.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CLOSED_CANNOT_BE_DEFERRED
message.locale: This task has already been closed and therefore cannot be deferred.

message.name: ERR_RESTART_DATE_MUST_BE_LATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The restart date must be later than today.

message.name: ERR_RESTART_DATE_MUST_BE_EARLIER_THAN_TASK_DEADLINE
message.locale: The restart date must be earlier than task deadline date.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_RESERVE_CLOSED_TASK
message.locale: This task is closed and cannot be added to the My Tasks list.

message.name: ERR_TASK_MUST_BE_ASSIGNED_TO_YOU
message.locale: You may not add this task to your My Tasks list as it has not been assigned to you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ALREADY_RESERVED_BY_YOU
message.locale: This task has already been added to your My Tasks list.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ALREADY_RESERVED_BY_USER
message.locale: This task has already been made available by %1s.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ALREADY_RESERVED_BY_ANOTHER_USER
message.locale: This task has already been added to another user's My Tasks list.

message.name: ERR_NOT_DEFERRED_AND_CANNOT_BE_RESTARTED
message.locale: This task is not deferred and may not therefore be restarted.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NOT_RESERVED_BY_YOU_CANNOT_BE_RESTARTED_BY_YOU
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore cannot be restarted by you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NOT_RESERVED_CANNOT_BE_RESTARTED
message.locale: This task is not part of a My Tasks list and therefore cannot be restarted.

message.name: ERR_NOT_RESERVED_AND_CANNOT_BE_UNRESERVED
message.locale: This task is not part of a My Tasks list and therefore cannot be made available.

message.name: ERR_NOT_RESERVED_AND_CANNOT_BE_UNRESERVED_BY_YOU
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore cannot be made available by you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CLOSED_CANNOT_BE_UNRESERVED
message.locale: This task is closed and therefore cannot be made available.

message.name: ERR_RESERVE_FOR_USER_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: User %1s is not an active user, and tasks cannot be added to such a user's My Tasks list.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CLOSED_TIME_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This task is closed and therefore the total time worked cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NOT_RESERVED_BY_USER_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore the total time worked cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_TIMEWORKED_MINS_LESS_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The number of minutes worked must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_TASK_TIMEWORKED_HOURS_LESS_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The number of hours worked must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_TASK_TIMEWORKED_MINS_GREATER_THAN_SIXTY
message.locale: The number of minutes worked must be less than sixty.

message.name: ERR_TASK_TIMEWORKED_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Total time worked must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: The task is already closed and therefore cannot be closed again.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NOTRESERVED_BY_USER
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore cannot be closed by you.

message.name: INF_TASK_TIMEWORKED_MODIFIED
message.locale: Time Worked has been recorded for %1s by %2s.

message.name: INF_TASK_RESERVED
message.locale: Task %1s added to the My Tasks list by %2s.

message.name: INF_TASK_UNRESERVED
message.locale: Task %1s made available by %2s.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CANNONT_BE_CLOSED_FROM_THIS_PAGE
message.locale: Task %1s cannot be closed from this page

message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_REALLOCATE_CLOSED
message.locale: This task is closed and cannot be reallocated.

message.name: ERR_TASK_MUST_BE_RESERVED_TO_YOU_TO_REALLOCATE
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore cannot be reallocated by you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_FORWARD_CLOSED
message.locale: This task is closed and cannot be forwarded.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CANNOT_BE_FORWARDED_BY_YOU
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore cannot be forwarded by you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNTO_INVALID_TYPE
message.locale: The assignee you have chosen does not match the assignee type chosen. Please search for assignee again.

message.name: ERR_WORKQUEUE_MEMBER_INVALID_TYPE
message.locale: The member you have chosen does not match the member type chosen. Please search for member again.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FORWARD_ALLOCATION_BLOCKED_FOR_USER
message.locale: This task cannot be forwarded because the user is currently being blocked from the allocation of new task.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_TASK_RESERVE_TO_ME_SET_ACTIVE_TASK_REDIRECTION_PERIOD
message.locale: This task cannot be created as you currently have an active task redirection period and you have specified that the task should be added to your My Tasks list.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_TASK_RESERVE_TO_ME_SET_ACTIVE_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCKING_PERIOD
message.locale: This task cannot be created as you currently have an active task allocation blocking period and you have specified the task should be added to your My Tasks list.

message.name: TASKS_FORWARDED_SUCCESSFULLY
message.locale: Task(s) '%1n' successfully forwarded to '%2c': '%3s'.

message.name: TASKS_REALLOCATED_SUCCESSFULLY
message.locale: Task(s) '%1n' reallocated successfully.

message.name: NO_TASK_SELECTED
message.locale: You must select at least one task.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_TASK_SET_ACTIVE_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCKING_PERIOD
message.locale: This task cannot be created because the user "%1s" is currently being blocked from the allocation of new task.

message.name: INF_NO_TASK_DUE_TODAY
message.locale: No tasks due today.

message.name: INF_NO_OVERDUE_TASKS
message.locale: No overdue tasks.

message.name: INF_NO_TASKS_WITHOUT_DEADLINE
message.locale: No tasks without deadline.

message.name: ERR_RESERVE_MULTIPLE_TASK
message.locale: Could not add the task with ID %1n to the My Tasks list because of the following error: %2s

message.name: ERR_TASK_CANNOT_MODIFY_PRIORITY_CLOSED_TASK
message.locale: The priority of this task cannot be modified as the task is closed.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CANNOT_MODIFY_PRIORITY_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore the priority cannot be modified by you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CANNOT_MODIFY_DEADLINE_CLOSED_TASK
message.locale: The deadline of this task cannot be modified as the task is closed.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CANNOT_MODIFY_DEADLINE_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore the deadline cannot be modified by you.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NO_DEADLINE_CANNOT_CREATE_NEW_DEADLINE
message.locale: You can only edit an existing deadline using the Edit Deadline functionality. A new deadline cannot be created for the task.

message.name: INF_TASK_NUMBER_LABEL
message.locale: Task %1n

message.name: INF_STATUS_LABEL
message.locale: Status

message.name: ERR_CASEWORKER_TASK_FORWARD_XRV_TASK_BATCH_FORWARD
message.locale: This task cannot be forwarded manually as it has already been queued for forwarding. The new task assignee(s) will be notified once the forward completes.

message.name: INF_PRIORITY_LABEL
message.locale: Priority

message.name: INF_WORKED_ON_BY_LABEL
message.locale: Worked on by

message.name: INF_TIME_WORKED_LABEL
message.locale: Time Worked

message.name: INF_DEADLINE_LABEL
message.locale: Deadline

message.name: INF_LAST_ASSIGNED_LABEL
message.locale: Last Assigned
